price: Jedhi: “Amantii keessan Rabbiin beysiistuu? Rabbiin waan samiilee keessa jiruufi waan dachii keessa jiru ni beeka. Rabbiin waan hunda beekaadha.”
arabic: قُلۡ أَتُعَلِّمُونَ ٱللَّهَ بِدِينِكُمۡ وَٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَٱللَّهُ بِكُلِّ شَيۡءٍ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: qul atuʿallimūna al-laha bidīnikum wal-lahu yaʿlamu mā fī al-samāwāti wamā fī al-arḍi wal-lahu bikulli shayin ʿalīmun
